about_the_game:
Heroes & Redemption is a rogue-lite bullet-hell game where different characters and ability combinations are utilized to fight against progressively stronger enemies in order to survive. Play as the warrior Otwin Reid, who defeats the creatures and enemies that suddenly appear in the world. Acquire new companions and try to find the ones responsible for this chaos.

FEATURES

  • 8 playable characters with different ability appearances.

  • 4 types of altars with different tasks.

  • Epic boss fights.

  • 4 sets of armor that provide different powers.

  • 10 rings, each possessing a unique power.

  • 20 active and 22 passive abilities, a total of 42 skills.

  • 29 empowered skills that enhance your base skills.

FIGHT AND EXPLORE 

Level up by slaughtering enemies that spawn in every direction. Make your character near immortal in this adventure by choosing one of randomly offered abilities each time you level up and by purchasing runes, armors, rings and empowered skills at the hub.

Complete levels by fulfilling objectives at altars that appear in specific waves. Explore special locations on the maps or complete achievements to unlock new characters and abilities.

MEET THE HEROES

Each hero brings unique strengths and a dark past to the battlefield. Whether it's the furious warrior, the elusive rogue who strikes from the shadows, the spell-weaving mage, or the unstoppable paladin with hammer in hand, every character is ready to confront dark forces. Join them, harness their powers, and fight for the fate of the realm!

COMPLETE YOUR TASKS

In addition to defeating enemies, you need to complete tasks at altars that appear in random places with random objectives.

EQUIPMENT

You can earn soul shards by completing altars or killing enemies, and you can purchase armors or rings with soul shards.

There are 4 types of armor sets in total. Some of them grants you increased protection but slows you down, while others grants you less protection but different powers. Combine or use the set that best suits your playstyle and destroy the enemies in your own way.

Purchase 10 mystical rings, each granting unique powers to transform your character’s abilities – from enhanced strength and speed to soul absorbing magic and life-stealing powers.

SPEND YOUR GOLDS AT THE HUB

At the hub, you can purchase characters, runes and even buy empowered skills that evolve your powers.

A WORLD FULL OF CHAOS

Survive in the putrid dark crystal cave, embark on an expedition in old graveyard that filled with the traces of forgotten tombs, uncover the secrets of snowy village, be careful where you step in toxic sewers that filled with perilous waters and creatures, explore the old prison with ancient stone cells and annihilate all the enemies that cross your path.
